TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageStatePersister extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 视图状态持久性机制提供基本功能。

span.span: Provides the base functionality for ASP.NET view state persistence mechanisms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 请求和响应是本质上是无状态。The HTTP requests and responses are inherently stateless. 若要维护状态信息之间的 HTTP 请求，ASP.NET 服务器页可以存储状态。To maintain state information between HTTP requests, ASP.NET server pages can store state. 此状态下，名为视图状态，由页面和控件设置和使页和控件显示像它们是相同的用户所看到并在其最后一个往返于服务器上与之交互的数据组成。This state, called view state, consists of page and control settings and data that make the page and controls appear as if they are the same ones that the user saw and interacted with on their last round trip to the server. 有几种机制来存储到同一页面的连续请求之间的视图状态。Several mechanisms exist to store view state between successive requests to the same page. 抽象类表示这些状态信息存储机制的基类。The abstract class represents the base class for these state information storage mechanisms. 默认在 ASP.NET 中的视图状态持久性机制是维护状态信息作为 Base64 编码字符串中隐藏的 HTML 元素 (具有的元素`type`属性设置为`"hidden"`) 页上。The default view state persistence mechanism in ASP.NET is to maintain the state information as a Base64-encoded string in a hidden HTML element (an element with the `type` attribute set to `"hidden"`) on the page. ASP.NET 页面使用对象执行此工作，并使用实例序列化和反序列化对象状态信息。An ASP.NET page uses a object to perform this work, using an instance to serialize and deserialize object state information. 或者，可以存储的视图状态中页对象上使用 server为移动客户端使用的带宽有限和资源的类。Alternately, you can store the view state for your pages in the object on the server using the class for mobile clients with limited bandwidth and resources. 在某些情况下，可能会完全禁用视图状态持久性。In some cases, you might disable view state persistence altogether. 如果执行此操作，则结果是，有时依赖于状态持久性的页面和控件执行操作行为方式不正确。If you do this, the result is that sometimes pages and controls that rely on state persistence do not behave correctly. 有关页状态管理和视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information about page state management and view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 如果你正在编写控件，可以存储中的控件的状态信息字典中，这是对象。If you are writing controls, you can store state information for the controls in the dictionary, which is a object. 开发人员将检索到的控件状态属性。A developer would retrieve the control state through the property. 分配键和值与属性，并对象序列化为请求之间的状态信息。You assign keys and values to the property, and the object serializes the state information between requests. 若要执行处理在控件中的自定义状态，请重写和方法。To perform custom state handling in your control, override the and methods. 由页面开发人员禁用视图状态时，此字典中存储任何状态信息将丢失。Any state information that is stored in this dictionary is lost when view state is disabled by a page developer. 若要缓解此问题，在 ASP.NET 中可以将关键状态信息存储在单独的对象，调用控件状态的 2.0 版。To mitigate this, in ASP.NET version 2.0 you can store critical state information in a separate object, called control state. 由页面开发人员禁用视图状态时，不受影响的控件状态对象。The control state object is not affected when view state is disabled by a page developer. 将状态信息存储在控件状态对象需要控件重写和方法和控件经过注册才能存储状态信息在每次初始化该控件控制状态。Storing state information in the control state object requires that the control override the and methods and that the control be registered to store state information in control state every time the control is initialized. 您可以将控件注册为使用控件状态，通过重写方法，并调用方法。You can register a control to use control state by overriding the method and calling the method. 有关使用详细信息属性和控件状态时开发控件，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information about using the property and control state when developing controls, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). 要保持视图状态上不能支持现有的客户端视图状态持久性机制中，您可以扩展类来引入你自己的视图状态持久性方法，并可以使用页适配器配置 ASP.NET 应用程序若要使用不同的视图状态持久性机制基础提供页面时的客户端的类型。To maintain view state on clients that cannot support the existing view state persistence mechanisms, you can extend the class to introduce your own view state persistence methods, and you can use page adapters to configure your ASP.NET application to use different view state persistence mechanisms based on the type of client to which a page is served. 派生的类类必须重写抽象方法以在持久性介质中存储视图状态和控件状态和重写方法以将其解压缩。Classes that derive from the class must override the abstract method to store view state and control state in the persistence medium, and override the method to extract it. 如果你需要将视图状态和控件状态的字符串序列，则可以使用对象，它使用访问属性。If you need to serialize view state and control state to a string, you can use the object that is accessed using the property. 它有效地序列化和反序列化对象状态信息为 Base64 编码的字符串。It efficiently serializes and deserializes object state information to a Base64-encoded string. 此外可以重写属性来提供您自己的对象状态序列化机制。You can also override the property to supply your own object state serialization mechanism. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建将视图和控件状态保存在 Web 服务器的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a object that saves view and control state on the Web server. `StreamPageStatePersister`演示如何重写和方法来提取和保存视图状态信息。The `StreamPageStatePersister` demonstrates how to override the and methods to extract and save view state information. 因为与自适应呈现和客户端功能相关的状态持久性机制`MyPageAdapter`类提供激活`StreamPageStatePersister`ASP.NET 应用程序。Because the state persistence mechanisms are related to adaptive rendering and client capabilities, the `MyPageAdapter` class is provided to activate the `StreamPageStatePersister` for an ASP.NET application. 最后，浏览器功能 (.browser) 文件用于启用`MyPageAdapter`（在此情况下，默认 Web 浏览器） 的客户端的特定类的适配器。Finally, a browser capabilities (.browser) file is provided to enable the `MyPageAdapter` adapter for a specific class of clients (in this case, the default Web browser). [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建返回的实例的类`StreamPageStatePersister`，用于持久保存为 ASP.NET 网页的视图和控件状态。The following code example demonstrates how to create a class that returns an instance of `StreamPageStatePersister`, which is used to persist view and control state for an ASP.NET Web page. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/mypageadapter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/mypageadapter.vb#5)] 将这两个类编译为可用于运行示例时，使用以下编译器命令行程序集。Compile these two classes into an assembly that you can use to run a sample, using the following compiler command line. 请确保已编译的程序集是在 ASP.NET 应用程序根目录下的 \Bin 目录中。Ensure that the compiled assembly is in the \Bin directory underneath the ASP.NET application root. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/mypageadapter.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/mypageadapter.vb#6)] 最后，若要启用`MyPageAdapter`适配器，必须创建一个名为 ASP.NET 应用程序根目录下的浏览器并将.browser 文件包含配置信息。Finally, to enable the `MyPageAdapter` adapter, you must create a directory named Browsers underneath the ASP.NET application root, and include a .browser file with configuration information. ``配置文件中的元素指示配置替代为默认浏览器 Default.browser 配置文件中指定的值。The `` element in the configuration file indicates that the configuration overrides the values specified for the default browser in the Default.browser configuration file. 在此示例中，`MyPageAdapter`用于 ASP.NET Web pages （通常没有适配器使用）。In this example, `MyPageAdapter` is used for ASP.NET Web pages (where normally no adapter is used). ``` ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象表示当前 对象包含的控件用于跨 Web 服务器的 HTTP 请求保留的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the data that controls contained by the current object use to persist across HTTP requests to the Web server.

value.span: 包含视图状态数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains view state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件状态是组成关键的视图状态数据的 Web 服务器控件需要对函数，并包含在一个单独的对象中的普通视图状态信息的对象。Control state is an object comprised of critical view state data that Web server controls need to function, and is contained in a separate object from normal view state information. 在禁用视图状态时，不受影响的控件状态数据级别，但需要使用额外的实现步骤。Control state data is not affected when view state is disabled at the level, but requires extra implementation steps to use. 有关使用的详细信息属性和控件状态时开发控件，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information on using the property and control state when developing controls, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类初始化属性。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class initializes the property. 在此示例中，属性赋予字段对象，并使用序列化类。In this example, the property has been assigned to the field of a object, and serialized using the class. 当调用方法时，类用于反序列化视图状态和控件状态信息，并属性初始化从生成对象的字段。When the method is called, the class is used to deserialize view state and control state information, and the property is initialized from the resulting object's field. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Load() cil managed

summary.span: 在 对象初始化其控件层次结构时，由派生类重写以反序列化并加载保留的状态信息。

span.span: Overridden by derived classes to deserialize and load persisted state information when a object initializes its control hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类类实现方法来初始化和从一些持久格式的属性。Classes that derive from the class implement the method to initialize the and properties from some persisted format. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类实现方法以从持久性介质中加载视图状态。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class implements the method to load view state from a persistence medium. `StreamPageStatePersister`尝试从流中读取数据。The `StreamPageStatePersister` attempts to read data from a stream. 它使用对象反序列化视图状态数据并初始化属性和属性，该页面使用初始化控件属性。It uses an object to deserialize view state data and initialize the property and the property, which a page uses to initialize controls. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]

summary.span: 在从内存中卸载 对象时，由派生类重写以对所保留的状态信息进行序列化。

span.span: Overridden by derived classes to serialize persisted state information when a object is unloaded from memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类类实现方法以持久保存的内容和到持久性介质中的属性。Classes that derive from the class implement the method to persist the contents of the and properties to a persistence medium. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类实现方法将视图状态保存到持久性介质中。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class implements the method to persist view state to a persistence medium. `StreamPageStatePersister`使用对象的内容进行序列化属性和属性。The `StreamPageStatePersister` uses an object to serialize the contents of the property and property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#3)]

span.span: An instance of that is used to serialize and deserialize object state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写属性以提供自己的视图状态格式化程序。You can override the property to provide your own view state formatter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类访问属性来检索对象，它是默认实现的接口，以序列化视图为流的状态和控件状态。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class accesses the property to retrieve an object, which is the default implementation of the interface, to serialize view state and control state to a stream. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象表示当前 对象包含的控件用于跨 Web 服务器的 HTTP 请求保留的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the data that controls contained by the current object use to persist across HTTP requests to the Web server.

value.span: 包含视图状态数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains view state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是 Web 服务器控件需要函数，并将自己呈现的状态数据的字典。View state is a dictionary of state data that Web server controls need to function and render themselves. 控件开发人员通常访问视图状态对象使用属性。Control developers typically access the view state object using the property. 在禁用视图状态时，受影响的视图状态级别，并因此导致控件可能无法正确在这些情况下。View state is affected when view state is disabled at the level, and as a result controls might not behave correctly in these scenarios. 有关使用的详细信息和控件状态，在开发控件时，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information on using and control state when developing controls, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类初始化属性。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class initializes the property. 在此示例中，属性赋予字段对象，并使用序列化对象，它是实例的接口。In this example, the property has been assigned to the field of a object, and serialized using the object, which is an instance of the interface. 当调用方法时，接口用于反序列化的视图状态信息，并属性初始化从生成对象的字段。When the method is called, the interface is used to deserialize view state information, and the property is initialized from the resulting object's field. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]
